description: This file contains unit tests for the AccountService class in a Java-based backend, focusing on methods related to reading bank and utility accounts, using Mockito for mocking dependencies.

classes.name: AccountServiceTest
classes.description: JUnit test class for testing the AccountService's methods related to retrieving account data.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Initializes mock repositories and the AccountService instance before each test.

methods.name: readBankAccount_found
methods.description: Tests that readBankAccount returns a non-null result when the account is found.

methods.name: readBankAccount_notFound
methods.description: Tests that readBankAccount throws EntityNotFoundException when the account isn't found.

methods.name: readUtilityAccount_byProvider_found
methods.description: Tests that readUtilityAccount by provider returns a non-null result when found.

methods.name: readUtilityAccount_byProvider_notFound
methods.description: Tests that readUtilityAccount by provider throws EntityNotFoundException when not found.

methods.name: readUtilityAccount_byId_found
methods.description: Tests that readUtilityAccount by ID returns a non-null result when found.

methods.name: readUtilityAccount_byId_notFound
methods.description: Tests that readUtilityAccount by ID throws EntityNotFoundException when not found.
